query:
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, p.name as permission_name 
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN user_permissions up ON u.id = up.user_id 
LEFT JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.id 
WHERE u.email = 'just2vip@gmail.com';
